page.title: 01Introduction to Aston
page.content: The present Aston has developed around 4 old villages.Originally it was a{rural community}centred around the{HALL and CHURCH,but MINING in the {area}led to changes in the community. After the{M1}was built,25 years ago,a great deal of new housing and businesses have sprung up.The new families have placed a strain on the limited{SHOPPING,WELFARE and LEISURE {facilities. The{M1}led to a tremendous increase in traffic through Aston to Sheffield. This has decreased since the{BY-PASS was completed in 1985. {Today,Aston is a suburb of Sheffield {and Rotherham}with a population of over 15,000.New housing is still being built but little in the way of facilities is being provided apart from a recent new Primary School bringing the total to 8 schools.
